TestGroupDocumentation.Title: pattern2 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a pattern-2.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType with pattern value "\-\d{5}".

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -31966 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -10000, -99999 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger pattern-2.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls pattern-2-1.xml document which specifies valid value -31966 for the nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-pattern-2 element, sets the values: -100000, -9999, -100, -10, -1, 0, 1, 10, 100, 10000, 100000 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -10000, -99999 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML nonPositiveInteger pattern-2.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of nonPositiveInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-nonPositiveInteger-pattern-2 type, sets the values: -100000, -9999, -100, -10, -1, 0, 1, 10, 100, 10000, 100000 and expects validation to fail.
